Submit a plugin

research-cli-tabs-autohide

Autohide all tabs.

research-cli-highlight-active-pane

Highlight the currently active pane in Research-CLI

research-cli-shellect

A short and shweet shell shellection menu.

research-cli-letters

Extension for Research-CLI that drops entered letters physically in your terminal.

research-cli-init

The ultimate and most complete extension to initialize commands before and after Research-CLI terminal starts

research-cli-launch-menu

Launch more than one kind of shell from the menu

research-cli-yes

Answers 'Terminate batch job (y/n)' with a resounding Y for you

research-cli-fading-scrollbar

A research-cli plugin that fades the scrollbar when not in use.

research-cli-final-say

Allow user-set settings in .research-cli.js overrides any plugin or theme defaults.

research-cli-vivifyscrum

VivifyScrum Extension for Research-CLI that allows you to take a quick look to assigned Items...

research-cli-active-tab

Add a symbol to the active tab in your Research-CLI.app terminal

research-cli-single-instance

Open a new tab instead of a new window instance when opening Research-CLI.

research-cli-savetext

Save text from your Research-CLI terminal to a file

research-cli-quit

Quit Research-CLI on macOS when the last window is closed

research-cli-opacity

Set the opacity of your Research-CLI window.

research-cli-dark-scrollbar

Dark and sleek scrollbar for Research-CLI

research-cli-arc-dark-controls

Arc-themed window controls for Research-CLI

research-cli-broadcast

Extension for Research-CLI.app to broadcast user inputs to multiple terms.

research-cli-tabs-enhanced

Enhanced Tabs Plugin for Research-CLI. Matches any theme.

research-cli-search

Extension for Research-CLI that allows you to search text in your terminal.

research-clicwd

Opens new tabs with the same directory as the current tab in Research-CLI for OS X, Linux, and Windows.

research-cli-pane

Extension for Research-CLI.app to enhance pane navigation. Navigate through panes with arrows, jump directly to a specific pane with digit, change focus on mouse hover or temporarily maximize a pane.

research-clipower

Extension for Research-CLI that turns on power mode, with bonus wow mode
